name: TaxCode
comment: Maintains  valid values of tax codes and the corresponding parameters that affects tax calculations.The Amdocs Billing System enables the definitions for each tax code and details on whether taxes need to be calculated using internal or external tax calculation. For external tax calculation, each tax code uses a different external tax package. Examples of tax codes include:* TX1 - 10% tax* STD - Standard tax
vf short description: Maintains  valid values of tax codes and the corresponding parameters that affects tax calculations.

fields.name: TaxCodeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: TaxCodeKey
fields.comment: Indicates the tax codes and tax parameters that affect the tax calculations. //CES:TX1_TAX_CODE.TAX_CODE//Generated Key on Tax Code Id//Optima:Generated Key based on Tax Code Id

fields.name: TaxCodeId
fields.comment: Indicates the tax code to determine the taxes that must be calculated. //CES:TX1_TAX_CODE.TAX_CODE//Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_VALUES.TAX_PKG_INST_ID

fields.name: TaxCodeDesc
fields.comment: Specifies the tax code. //CES:TX1_TAX_CODE.DESCRIPTION//Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_VALUES.DISPLAY_VALUE

fields.name: TaxPkgTypeCode
fields.comment: Tax package type:1 = Sales2 = CommTax3 = Universal4 = Custom5 = Brazilian Tax6 = Turnover Tax (TOT)7 = IVA Perception Tax //OptimaTAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.TAX_PKG_TYPE

fields.name: BinnedFlag
fields.comment: Incicates if the tax calculated on a bin, or collection, of charges. 0 = no binning, 1 = binning according to the value of tax_pkg_inst_id, tax_class (ignore if Null in TAX_RATES_VAT), tax_rate, billing_category, provider_id, late_fee, and franchise_code partof geocode if is_franchise = 1 or country_code part ofgeocode if is_franchise = 0.2 = BSF binning, 3 = service-instance binning, 4 = invoice-level binning //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.IS_BINNED.

fields.name: DistributedFlag
fields.comment: Are the taxes distributed back to the binu00E2u20ACu2122s charges? (1 = yes) //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.IS_DISTRIBUTED

fields.name: FranchiseFlag
fields.comment: Is this a franchise tax (for Universal Tax Package only)? (1 = yes)0 = store tax in federal_tax1 = store tax in other_tax //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.IS_FRANCHISE

fields.name: ExcludeChargeFlag
fields.comment: Exclude charge amount and only calculate tax on the chargeu00E2u20ACu2122s tax amount? (1 = yes) //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.EXCLUDE_CHARGE

fields.name: GraduatedFlag
fields.comment: Allow graduated (tiered) taxes?0 = Ignore entirely1 = Tiered, incrementally2 = Tiered, in bulk If tax_pkg_type not equal to 3, the value of thisfield is ignored by Kenan/BP. //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.IS_GRADUATED

fields.name: TaxTypeCode
fields.comment: Tax type:1 = point-of-invoice2 = point-of-sale //Optima:TAX_PKG_INST_ID_REF.TAX_TYPE

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
